description: 最近的package.json可以代表文件使用的模块类型，否则报错
description2:
ReferenceError: require is not defined in ES module scope, you can use import instead
This file is being treated as an ES module because it has a '.js' file extension and 'D:\web-common\package.json' contains "type": "module". To treat it as a CommonJS script, rename it to use the '.cjs' file extension.
description3:
require() of ES Module D:\web-common\nodejs\cjs\download.js from D:\importAssets.js not supported.
download.js is treated as an ES module file as it is a .js file whose nearest parent package.json contains "type": "module" which declares all .js files in that package scope as ES modules.
Instead either rename download.js to end in .cjs, change the requiring code to use dynamic import() which is available in all CommonJS mod
ules, or change "type": "module" to "type": "commonjs" in D:\web-common\package.json to treat all .js files as CommonJS (using .mjs for all ES modules instead).
